automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_sequence'
alias: Office WLED - Living Room Sequence
description: "When Office WLED turns on, sequence living room and office brightness levels"
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100
